title: Creating a reading list on meaning representation involves selecting articles that cover various aspects of the topic, including theoretical foundations, computational models, and applications. Here is a list of 20 articles up to 2022 that you might find useful

author.literal: **"A Survey on Semantic Parsing"** - Kamath, A., & Das, R.

title: This article provides an overview of semantic parsing techniques, which are crucial for meaning representation
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"**
This paper introduces BERT, a model that has significantly influenced meaning representation in NLP

author.literal: **"Attention Is All You Need"** - Vaswani, A., Shazeer, N., Parmar, N., Uszkoreit, J., Jones, L., Gomez, A. N., Kaiser, Ł., & Polosukhin, I.

note: This foundational paper on the Transformer model has implications for meaning representation.

title: **"Universal Dependencies: A Cross-Linguistic Perspective on Syntax for Natural Language Processing"**
This paper discusses a framework for syntactic annotation that aids in meaning representation

author.literal: **"A Neural Probabilistic Language Model"** - Bengio, Y., Ducharme, R., Vincent, P., & Jauvin, C.

title: This classic paper introduces a neural network approach to language modeling, which is foundational for meaning representation
This article explains the Word2Vec model, a key development in word meaning representation
**"GloVe: Global Vectors for Word Representation"**
This paper presents GloVe, another influential model for word meaning representation

author.literal: **"ELMo: Deep Contextualized Word Representations"** - Peters, M. E., Neumann, M., Iyyer, M., Gardner, M., Clark, C., Lee, K., & Zettlemoyer, L.

title: This paper introduces ELMo, which captures word meaning in context
**"The Role of Syntax in Vector Space Models of Compositional Semantics"**
This article explores the integration of syntax in meaning representation
**"Semantic Role Labeling: Past, Present and Future"**
This paper reviews semantic role labeling, a key task in meaning representation
**"A Survey on Recent Advances in Named Entity Recognition from Deep Learning models"**
This survey covers NER, which is important for understanding meaning in text

author.literal: **"The Stanford CoreNLP Natural Language Processing Toolkit"** - Manning, C. D., Surdeanu, M., Bauer, J., Finkel, J., Bethard, S. J., & McClosky, D.

title: This paper describes a toolkit that includes tools for meaning representation

author.literal: **"Compositional Semantics with Long Short-Term Memory"** - Tai, K. S., Socher, R., & Manning, C. D.

title: This article discusses the use of LSTMs for compositional semantics

author.literal: **"A Survey on Knowledge Graphs: Representation, Acquisition, and Applications"** - Hogan, A., Blomqvist, E., Cochez, M., d'Amato, C., de Melo, G., Gutierrez, C., Kirrane, S., Gayo, J. E. L., Navigli, R., Neumaier, S., Polleres, A., Rashid, S. M., Rula, A., Schmelzeisen, L., Sequeda, J., Staab, S., & Zimmermann, A.

title: This survey covers knowledge graphs, which are crucial for representing meaning
**"The Meaning Factory: Formal Semantics for Recognizing Textual Entailment and Determining Semantic Similarity"**
This paper discusses formal semantics in the context of textual entailment

author.literal: **"A Survey on Semantic Parsing from Text to Graphs"** - Kollar, T., Tellex, S., Roy, D., & Roy, N.

title: This survey covers the conversion of text to semantic graphs
**"The Role of Context in Neural Language Models"**
This article explores the importance of context in meaning representation

author.literal: **"A Survey on Deep Learning for Named Entity Recognition"** - Yadav, V., & Bethard, S.

title: This survey discusses deep learning approaches to NER, relevant for meaning representation
**"Semantic Role Labeling: An Introduction to the Special Issue"**
This introduction provides an overview of semantic role labeling
**"A Survey on Semantic Parsing: Towards a New Generation of Natural Language Understanding Systems"**
This survey discusses advancements in semantic parsing
These articles cover a range of topics related to meaning representation, from foundational models to specific applications and surveys
